name: coderabbit-complete-convex
title: CodeRabbit Complete (Convex)
description: Complete CodeRabbit integration with Convex database. Includes core functionality, React hook, form, branding, and Convex adapter with real-time sync. Perfect for production applications requiring persistent storage.
docs: Get CODERABBIT_API_KEY from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan). Import coderabbitReportsTable in your convex/schema.ts and add as 'coderabbit_reports' table. Pass ConvexReactClient instance and api to ConvexStorageAdapter constructor.
